Switzerland's Nemo wins 2024 Eurovision.content: Beating runner-up Croatia, Switzerland won the international song competition in the Swedish host city of Malmo.Croatia's Baby Lasagna, born Marko Purisic, 28, came second with "Rim Tim Tagi Dim", a song about a young man who leaves home aspiring to become a "city boy" with better opportunities.Swiss rapper and singer Nemo, 24, took the trophy home for his song "The Code", a drum-and-bass, opera, rap and rock track about Nemo's journey of self-discovery as a non-binary person.The 2024 Eurovision winner received the contest's official glass trophy, shaped like a classic, old-fashioned microphone.The winner also gets to host the competition the next year.

AI cameras tested in Cannes ahead of Oly.content: State-of-the-art security using artificial intelligence is being deployed at the Cannes Film Festival in a test for potential applications at the Paris Olympics two months later.But Paris authorities say they are sending some 400 security forces in addition to the 200 officers and 66 surveillance agents already in Cannes.The Cannes town hall has been asking to implement them since 2019 but has only been given permission thanks to changes in surveillance laws introduced for the Olympics that kick off in Paris in July, according to Mayor David Lisnard.The festival has a further 400 security guards around the main venue, the Palais des Festivals -- not to mention the many private security agents employed at all the beach, villa and yacht parties.There were concerns that mobilisation for the Olympics would deprive the festival of police resources.

Did you know these luxury brands refused.content: For this year's dress code, ‘The Garden of Time’ the actress not just walked wearing one, not two but three looks.The Euphoria star has achieved a lot in her career, and this year she co-chaired the Met Gala, the fashion's biggest night, for the first time along with Chris Hemsworth, Bad Bunny and Jennifer Lopez.'” Further, Roach went on to reveal that her client still did not wear any one of those big fashion pieces, who turned her down, except one.For her first walk, she donned a villainous look, featuring a strapless one-shouldered gown with a dramatic blue and green stripe by Maison Margiela.In an interview with The Cutting Room Floor, Roach said, “I would write the big five.

Dutch contestant excluded from Eurovisio.content: Dutch contestant Joost Klein was dropped from Saturday's Eurovision final just hours before the event following an incident unlinked to the controversy over Israel's participation in the Gaza war."Swedish police have investigated a complaint made by a female member of the production crew after an incident following his performance in Thursday night's Semi Final," the European Broadcasting Union said in a statement.At the press conference after the second semi-final, Klein repeatedly covered his face with a Dutch flag, seemingly signifying he didn't agree with being placed next to the Israeli contestant Eden Golan.Dutch pubic broadcaster Avrotros told AFP in an email that it found the move "disproportionate", adding that it it was "shocked by the decision".Swedish police told AFP they had questioned a man for alleged "intimidation".

Meghan Markle reveals why she married Pr.content: During the first day of the event, Harry talked about mental health and Markle was all things proud of him.At the event, Harry took the mic as he addressed the stigma around mental health.“In some cases around the world, in more than you would believe, there is a stigma when it comes to mental health.”The couple kicked off their trip on May 10 by visiting a school in the capital city of Abuja, where they took part in the mental health summit.”"Just make sure that you are taking care of yourselves and that begins with your mental health by really talking about whatever's coming up for you," she said.

Freedom at Midnight: Arif Zakaria and Ir.content: ”On playing Fatima Jinnah in the series, Ira said, “Freedom at Midnight marks my second collaboration with Sony LIV after Potluck.Similarly, Ira Dubey's portrayal of Fatima Jinnah, who played a significant role in supporting and influencing his journey.Zakaria and Dubey will bring to life the pivotal figures of Muhammad Ali Jinnah and Fatima Jinnah (his sister) in the upcoming series.""When casting for the roles of Jinnah and Fatima in the series, I was immediately drawn to Arif Zakaria for his striking physical presence - gaunt, towering, with piercing eyes and a commanding voice that exuded authenticity.Expressing his excitement about playing a towering personality like Muhammad Ali Jinnah in the series, actor Arif Zakaria said, “In preparing to portray Muhammad Ali Jinnah, I realised how important it was to depict him as a flawed and complicated human being rather than an untouchable hero.

Sean 'Diddy' Combs denies raping minor i.content: Sean "Diddy" Combs, along with former Bad Boy Entertainment president Harve Pierre, is facing a lawsuit accusing them and another individual labelled as "Third Assailant" of sexual assault.In February, Rodney “Lil Rod” Jones, a former producer and videographer, filed a lawsuit claiming that Combs sexually harassed, drugged, and threatened him during their time working together."This lawsuit is one of several sexual assault lawsuits that Combs has faced in recent months.In response to the allegations, Combs' lawyers have filed a motion to dismiss the lawsuit, calling it a "second attempt to state an entirely false and hideous claim against the Combs Defendants.District Court for the Southern District of New York, alleges that Combs, Pierre, and the "Third Assailant" sex trafficked and gang-raped her when she was a minor.

When Orry thought famous street food vad.content: "One day, I told someone to bring it, the Indian-style burger.During his recent appearance on Bharti TV, Orry candidly revealed that he wasn't aware of vada pav, and has always thought it was a type of Indian burger.When asked on the podcast if he had ever eaten the famous Mumbai's Vada Pav, the socialite said that he had eaten it but always thought it was an aloo tikki burger.I thought I am eating Mc Aloo Tikki, like the pav and the yellow suraj-thing, I really thought I was having aloo tikki burger.I thought it was a burger, McAloo Tikki (McDonalds burger).

Sikkimese director Samten Bhutia's Tara:.content: Hailing the team for the big achievement, Sikkim Chief Minister Prem Singh Tamang wrote on X,  ''Congratulations to the team behind 'Tara: The Lost Star' for its debut at Cannes International Film Festival 2024, a remarkable achievement for Sikkim.''Congratulations to the team behind 'Tara: The Lost Star' for its debut at Cannes International Film Festival 2024, a remarkable achievement for Sikkim.Elaborating more on the movie, the filmmakers told PTI, ''With its compelling narrative, 'Tara: The Lost Star' is a feature film in Nepali Language which offers a window into the beliefs of Himalayas and Sikkim's vibrant culture.As the excitement builds for its Cannes debut, 'Tara: The Lost Star' promises to shine a spotlight on Sikkim's burgeoning film industry like never before," they said.This year, a Sikkimese feature film Tara: The Lost Star from Sikkimese Director Samten Bhutia has been selected for market screening  (Marche du Film) at the prestigious film festival.

Mother's Day Special: Moms who've create.content: Her daughter Alaya F earned a diploma in acting at the New York Film Academy, made her debut in Jawaani Jaaneman and won the Filmfare Award for Best Female Debut.However, right from her debut in Student of the Year, her daughter cracked the code of commercial success.Neena who has appeared in cult films (Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro, Saath Saath, Utsav), starred in the clutter-breaking Doordarshan show Khandaan and directed a TV drama (Saans) is now also enjoying major commercial success via hits like Badhaai Ho and The Last Color.She did not land the part but life came full circle when her daughter starred in an international production, Heart of Stone in 2023.Daughter Masaba, after establishing herself as a fashion and beauty entrepreneur, has also successfully ventured into acting with the popular Netflix show, Masaba Masaba where Neena plays herself with trademark candour.

Viral clip of Deepika Padukone slamming.content: Bollywood actress Deepika Padukone, who is currently expecting her first child with Ranveer Singh, grabbed headlines earlier this week for a viral video that showed her pushing a fan's phone at Mumbai airport.Reacting to the viral clip, a user wrote, "She is pregnant, Can she have some privacy?Deepika and Ranveer revealed in February this year that they are expecting their first child in September.The paparazzo who shared the account has deleted the clip from his official Instagram handle.On Wednesday, Deepika shared a picture from the sets of Piku and wrote, "He loves telling everyone how much I eat!

Viral: Ashutosh Rana's deepfake video sh.content: "Even Ashutosh Rana is appealing to people to vote for BJP 👏👏👏 pic.com/w6jXVFHbG9The actor also clarified that he has no intention of running in elections and become a member of parliament.This is why people feel that I would soon join the sansad (Parliament).On the movie front, Ashutosh Rana is currently captivating audiences with his portrayal of a journalist in the web series Murder in Mahim, directed by Raj Acharya.After Aamir Khan and Ranveer Singh, Bollywood actor Ashutosh Rana has fallen victim to deepfake videos.

Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas enjoy a s.content: Coming to Priyanka's work front, the actress recently wrapped up filming for her upcoming film, Heads of State.Recently, she shared a reel to announce the wrap of the film.The 41-year-old, along with her husband Nick Jonas and daughter Malti Marie, is vacationing on the European island and savouring tranquil moments amidst picturesque landscapes.The snap shows Priyanka posing next to her mother Madhu and daughter Malti.The snap shows the actress playing with her daughter as her husband gazes softly.

Kris Jenner buys toy Tesla Cybertruck fo.content: Kim also shared a touching tribute for her son, describing him as "sweet, smart, silly, independent." She humorously noted Psalm's penchant for sleeping, promising to one day show him an entire photo album dedicated to his naps."I’ve never met someone who sleeps more than you do and one day I will show you the entire photo album I’ve made of your sleeps!The post's caption read, "Happy birthday to my amazing grandson Psalm, who is truly one of the lights and loves of my heart and my life!My sweet, smart, silly, independent baby boy turns 5 years old today!

Row over Israel's Eurovision slot oversh.content: At the end of Thursday's semi-final, the 26-year-old had appeared to object to being placed beside Golan, at several points covering his face with a Dutch flag.The war in Gaza was sparked by Hamas's October 7 attack on Israel, which resulted in the deaths of more than 1,170 people, mostly civilians, according to an AFP tally of Israeli official figures.Israel's presence in the Eurovision song contest triggered fierce debate Friday amid protests in the host city, while the Dutch contestant was mysteriously pulled from rehearsals on the eve of the final.Thousands of pro-Palestinian demonstrators marched through Malmo on Thursday before Israeli singer Eden Golan made it through to the final on Saturday when more protests are expected.- A controversial entry -More controversy erupted after the European Broadcasting Union organisers announced that Dutch competitor Joost Klein had been prevented from rehearsing Friday over an unspecified "incident".

Oscars Academy, at pivotal point, launch.content: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences on Friday launched a $500 million fundraising drive, pegged to the upcoming centenary of the Oscars.Sponsors have already committed more than $100 million to the campaign, the Academy said.Named Academy100 -- ahead of the 100th Oscars ceremony, set for 2028 -- the drive is intended to diversify finances for the group, which plays a key role in fostering new filmmakers and preserving movies, as well as handing out the annual Academy Awards.The group also launched the popular Academy Museum of Motion Pictures in Los Angeles in 2021."The Academy will soon enter its second century, and we want to ensure that we continue to be the preeminent leader of our international film community," said Academy CEO Bill Kramer, in a statement."

Demon Slayer Season 4: Hashira Training.content:
Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc will premiere with an hour-long episode on  May 12, 2024.The fourth season of Demon Slayer will continue over from the Swordsmith Village arc and adapt the manga's Hashira Training arc.Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc🥋

📺| Episode 1: In Order to Defeat Muzan Kibutsuji

🗓️| 12th May at 11:15 pm JST with an hour long-special broadcast

— ‘Mitsuri’s Uniform’ will be added to the episode with new eye catchers and end credits

「#鬼滅の刃」「#柱稽古編」 pic.Demon Slayer is back for another season with Hashira Training Arc.com/IlCanbHCVlDemon Slayer Season 4: Hashira Training Arc will be the shortest season yet as it will only cover 9 chapters from the manga.

Angelina Jolie encouraged children to av.content: The legal battle between Jolie and Pitt has been marked by accusations and counter-accusations, with each party attempting to sway the court in their favour with their claims.The latest allegations of Jolie allegedly encouraging the children to avoid Pitt during visits add another layer of complexity to the already long and complicated legal battle between the Hollywood exes.Webb, who worked for Jolie from 2000 to 2020, alleged that he was contacted by a Jolie aide named Michael Vieira, who attempted to prevent two bodyguards from testifying in Jolie's custody battle with Pitt.In the ongoing legal battle between Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt, a new set of allegations have emerged against Jolie.Despite the NDAs, one of the bodyguards, Ross Foster, expressed his intention to testify about statements he allegedly overheard from Jolie where she encouraged the children to avoid spending time with Pitt during custody visits, reported People magazine.

As Sarfarosh completes 25 years, Aamir K.content: Aamir Khan and the team of Sarfarosh gathered under one roof to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the film.Well, this screening was definitely a special one, as after so long, the audience got to watch Aamir Khan's Sarfarosh on screen which is considered one of his finest performances to date.While the event saw the team reminiscing about the iconic film, the film’s lead actor Aamir Khan made an important announcement about Sarfarosh 2.The event was a grand one which had team members of the film and eminent celebrities from the entertainment world in attendance.Aamir Khan said, "I can commit about one thing, that we will give it a really serious shot now of coming up with the right script and a right kind of film for it.
